Hydras/Perceptor:

"No if we get the hostage before"hissed Perceptor "Rodimus won't try 
to attack us if he knows that whe have such guest in our grasp..."

"Or he will attack quickly in order to take him back, Perceptor" 
replied Hydras with a Ironic tone "You haven't seen my old pal 
angry...."

"Excuse master, but he didn't attack if we show him that we can hurt 
HER as soon as their come in our territory... that would give us an 
advantage and a piece to negociate with advantage, in case that 
things go wrong"
